Okay, the way I look at it is that you are an idiot. First get your spelling and grammar correct before you start spewing stupidity all over the web. I know it must be hard for you to type with some form of education, but still for the rest of us please try. Secondly this has to be the most retarded point I think anyone can make. I love aviation, have my whole life and I know what a military aircraft and civilian aircraft look like. I know for a fact that the second plane crashing into the World Trade Center WAS, capitalized for importance, a Boeing 757. Also I highly doubt that the designers of the buildings had any inkling that some insane religious idiots would fly a multi-ton aircraft at over 500 knots in to the buildings. That right there would cause some serious structural damage. That explains the physics of the collapse, since they WERE, again this is important, designed to cave in on themselves if they were to fall. One last thing, if you need that many tags to call attention to your little subject then you must have something that really isn't plausible. Sorry but your really are retarded.
